Uses of Class
com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.annotations.Synchronized

  • Packages that use Synchronized 
    Package Description
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.logging
    This package contains the NetCom2 logging API, which is used in all other modules within NetCom2.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Client.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared  
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.cache
    This package contains multiple interfaces and Objects, regarding an low-level-cache.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients
    This is the core package for Communication.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.comm
    This Package is associated with the Communication between the ClientStart and the ServerStart.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.heartbeat  
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.synchronization  
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.pipeline  
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.utility  

    • Uses of Synchronized in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.logging

      Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.logging with annotations of type Synchronized 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CallerReflectionLogging
      This logging implementation uses reflection to determine the caller of any method.
      class  DebugLogging
      This implementation of Logging ignores the trace method
      class  DisabledLogging
      This Logging implementation ignores all calls and logs nothing.
      class  ErrorLogging
      This Logging implementation ignores all calls up to Logging.error()
      class  InfoLogging
      This Logging implementation ignores all calls up to info
      class  NetComLogging
      This class is the central entry point for the NetCom2Logging api.
      class  SystemDefaultStyleLogging
      This Class defines how NetCom2 logging looks.
      class  TraceLogging
      This is an instance of Logging, that logs every step.
      class  WarnLogging
      This logging implementation ignores all calls up to warn

      class  AbstractSynchronize
      This Class helps with creating a Synchronize instance, based on an CountDownLatch The only method, you would have to define is: Synchronize.error()
      class  EmptySynchronize
      This EmptySynchronize is an NullObject for Synchronize.
      class  Listener
      This listens for a specific ListenAndExpect, that takes an Class to check for specific actions

      Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.pipeline with annotations of type Synchronized 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  QueuedReceivePipeline<T>
      A queued ReceivePipeline implementation.
      class  ReceivePipelineHandlerPolicy
      This enumeration encapsulates methods to check capabilities of ReceivePipeline handlers in the respective modes.
      class  Wrapper
      This Class is used to encapsulate the OnReceiveWrapper class, which is not Public If you want to wrap an OnReceive or OnReceiveSingle to be encapsulated within an OnReceiveTriple, which is used within the ReceivePipeline, you may use this class.
